blocks.block_text: Robbery of a fragrant stuff , called abir used by devotees of Pandharinàth , discovered by a strata- gem ; the artifice reviled by Ghasiram and torture of all accused parties recommended .
lines: Robbery of a fragrant stuff , called abir used by devotees of Pandharinàth , discovered by a strata- gem ; the artifice reviled by Ghasiram and torture of all accused parties recommended .
